accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Kheel Center Triangle Fire Centennial Commemoration Collection Richard Strassberg #6317/003. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Includes White House press release proclaiming March 25, 2011 to be the 100th Anniversary of the Triangle Shirtwaist Factory Fire; 3 copies of "I've Got Something To Say"; Triangle Fire Memorial and Historical Association flyer.
